post.text: It's official: Hillary will be the first woman presidential nominee from a major political party. Watch live as she takes the stage in Brooklyn. hrc.io/1RWDBL6

comment.author: Steven
comment.text: Go Hillary!!! So proud of you and the campaign! Cannot wait to call you Madame President!

replies.author: Vanessa
replies.text: She hasn't won yet. PS all the people I know would NEVER EVER vote for a Goldwater Girl. #BernieOrBust #WhichHillary #HillNo #HillaryForPrison2016

replies.author: Crystal
replies.text: Ok, have fun voting for Don, black lady. He seems totally hospitable and on your side. Way to pick it. I think I voted for Spiderman at 14.

replies.author: Vanessa
replies.text: Charlie First of all why are you bringing my color in to this? By the way if you are going to refer to my color please don't call me black, it's clear I am mulatto. You're a middle schooler you should know these things. PS I'd rather vote for Bernie, his views and beliefs are the closest to Martin Luther King Jr.
